>  Block service.


* [Add (/relation/block/{id})](block.proto.md#add) - Block the specified account ID.


* [Cancel (/relation/block/{id})](block.proto.md#cancel) - Unblock the specified account ID.

>  Follow service.


* [Add (/relation/follow/account/{target_id})](follow.proto.md#add) - Add follow.


* [Cancel (/relation/follow/account/{id})](follow.proto.md#cancel) - Cancel follow.


* [GetFollowings (/relation/follow/followings/{id})](follow.proto.md#getfollowings) - Get account followings.


* [GetFollowers (/relation/follow/followers/{target.id})](follow.proto.md#getfollowers) - Get account followers.


* [GetFriends (/relation/follow/friends)](follow.proto.md#getfriends) - Get account friends.
